profile-1a.bot_text: Hey, I’m M. What should I call you?
Cool, [NAME]. You’re like the gazillionth person I’ve started chatting with...but it’s not a popularity contest, I swear! ;)
Lemme show you how this works. To start, we’ll keep it simple. I’ll say something to you & you just tap the button.
Anyway, most people think of me as their planet-saving guru....but not in a “reduce your carbon footprint kinda way”.

user_quick_reply.text: Hey, I’m all about reducing my footprint...I don’t even shower!

profile-1d.bot_text: So, yeah, I’m here to help you take power back from big ol’ corporations to actually prevent some really bad stuff that’s gonna happen kinda soon if they keep heating up the planet.

user_quick_reply.text: I hear you, let’s show these fools who’s boss.
